attributes.description:
In 2002 the Opel Corsa Utility has attained leading brand status in the sub 1-tonne segment of the pick-up market. During 2002 the Corsa pick-up achieved a market share of over 7% of all light commercial sales well ahead of its nearest competitor.

Customers attribute their preference for the Corsa to class leading engine performance and the position of leadership. Together with good driving dynamics, low whole life costs are an added advantage.

Feel free to get in contact with us today!
attributes.title: 2002 Opel Corsa Utility 1.4i
